Problems "commoditizing" the software, as well as the growing number of Android handsets at all price points were noted as hurdles, particularly given Nokia's already-sturdy mid-and-low range catalogue of handsets. Andy Coulson 's resignation comes as a huge blow to David Cameron , who had insisted Andy Coulson would stay on despite the scandal But when the spokesman needs a spokesman, it's time to move on, Andy Coulson said in a statement announcing his departure, the New York Times reported.
